title: Best Amazon Prime Big Deal Days bike computer offers 2023 | Up to 35% off Garmin and Wahoo
content:
The 2023 Amazon Prime Big Deal Day has a number of great savings on bike computers for cycling.

A bike computer enables you to measure your performance, log rides on apps such as Strava and navigate. The majority provide turn-by-turn guidance.

Garmin dominates the market, with units ranging from the diminutive Edge 130 Plus to the smartphone-sized Edge 1030 Plus, with Wahoo not coming in not too far behind.

We’ve divided our pick into the best deals in the USA and UK. You can skip to the best deals in the USA or UK by hitting the links below:

  • US Amazon Prime Big Deals Day bike computer deals
  • UK Amazon Prime Big Deals Day bike computer deals

Looking for more deals? Check out the best Amazon Prime Day cycling accessory deals and the best Amazon Prime Big Deal Days smartwatch offers 2023 for deals on Garmin, Polar, Fitbit and more.

When is Amazon Prime Big Deal Days?

Amazon has announced its second Prime Day event of the year. Named Amazon Prime Big Deal Days, it will kick off at midnight on Tuesday the 10th of October and will run all the way through to the end of Wednesday the 11th of October.

If you’re looking at bike computers, it’s a good time to pick up a bargain on Garmin and Wahoo. The deals are open to Amazon Prime members, while non-members can gain access by signing up for a free 30-day Prime trial.

We’ve done the hard work for you and picked out our favourite deals on bike computers, but you’ll find plenty more Prime Day bike computer offers on Amazon, too.

US Amazon Prime Big Deals Day bike computer deals

Garmin Edge 1030 Plus ($399.99 $299.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($299.99).

 

The Edge 1030 Plus is arguably the ultimate bike computer. It’s packed with every feature you need, boasting an updated processor, improved touchscreen, and a remarkable 24-hour battery life (extendable to 48 hours). With 32GB of internal storage and the Trailforks trail database, it’s your go-to companion for epic rides.

You can read our full Garmin Edge 1030 Plus review and click below to save 25 per cent during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($299.99).

Garmin Edge 1030 Plus bundle ($499.99 $399.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon $399.99

This Garmin Edge 1030 Plus bundle pairs the bike computer with a heart rate monitor, speed sensor and cadence sensor.

You can read our full Garmin Edge 1030 Plus review and click below to save 25 per cent during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon $399.99

Garmin Edge 530 ($299.99 $269.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($269.99)

The GarminEdge 530 is a feature-packed GPS computer for serious cyclists. Though lacking a touchscreen, it shares nearly all its capabilities with the pricier Edge 830, offering straightforward navigation, a clear colour display, and extensive performance tracking with optional sensors.

You can read our full Garmin Edge 530 review and click below to save 10 per cent during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($269.99)

Garmin Edge 830 Sensor Bundle ($449.99 $349.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($349.99)

The Edge 830, albeit a bit clunky at times, is a true class-leading GPS bike computer that offers plenty of useful functions above and beyond its competition. While its on-device data is easy to read, investing in additional sensors is recommended if you don’t already own compatible ones.

Overall, the Edge 830 has a fantastically diverse feature set that makes it one of the most comprehensive training and navigating devices money can buy.

You can read our full Garmin Edge 830 review and click below to save 22 per cent during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($349.99)

Wahoo ELEMNT Bolt V2 ($279.99 $229.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($229.99)

The Wahoo Elemnt Bolt V2 is a feature-packed GPS computer with an intuitive app-based setup, colour screen, smart navigation and impressive 15-hour battery life. It seamlessly syncs with third-party apps, making it a great choice for tracking performance and more.

While its mapping capabilities may not rival the Garmin computers in this list, its affordability and functionality make it a top choice for cyclists seeking a minimalist yet powerful package.

You can read our full Wahoo Elemnt Bolt V2 review and save 7 per cent during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($229.99)

UK Amazon Prime Big Deals Day bike computer deals

Garmin Edge 130 Plus (£169.99 £109.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£109.99).

For a truly diminutive option, the Garmin Edge 130 Plus is a sleek and simple training tool with a crisp 1.8-inch grayscale screen and easy-to-use external buttons. While it maintains the standout display from the original 130, it retains its compact dimensions, making it a convenient companion for your rides.

Although you can’t customize data screens through the app, it offers valuable performance metrics like VO2 max, heart rate, and power, making it a compelling choice for cyclists seeking essential data in a compact package.

Read our full review of the Garmin Edge 130 Plus and click below to save 35 per cent during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon (£109.99).

Garmin Edge Explore (£219.99 £159.00)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£159.00)

The Garmin Edge Explore has the essential functions you need to navigate and record your rides at a sensible price.

For the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days, it now has 28 per cent off.

  • Buy now from Amazon (£159.00)

Can I get access to Amazon Big Deal Days if I’m not a Prime member?

If you’re not a Prime member, you can sign up at Amazon Prime to access the Amazon Big Deal Days deals. Amazon offers a 30-day free trial for new members.

On top of the product discounts, you can also save in other areas, including Prime Video and Kindle Unlimited. Here are some of the extra deals you can enjoy:

  • Amazon Music Unlimited – Get three months for free
  • Kindle Unlimited – Get a 30-day free trial to access millions of books, audiobooks and magazines (usually £7.99 per month)
  • Audible – Pay £2.99 for four months to access a huge selection of audiobooks and podcasts (usually £7.99 per month)
  • Amazon Kids – Get a one-month free trial and access everything from child-friendly books, films and TV shows to educational apps and games (usually £6.99 or £3.99 for Prime members per month)
  • Prime Video – Try a 30-day free trial, giving you access to thousands of films and TV shows
